sentence: We should ______ unnecessary expenses to save money.
sentence_translation: 我们应该取消不必要的开支以节省资金。

sentence: This ______ conference attracts many experts from all over the world.
sentence_translation: 这个国际会议吸引了来自世界各地的许多专家。

sentence: We need to find a new ______ of energy to solve the problem.
sentence_translation: 我们需要找到一种新的能源来源来解决这个问题。

sentence: Please mark the important dates on the ______.
sentence_translation: 请在日历上标记重要的日期。

sentence: There are many beautiful buildings on the ______.
sentence_translation: 校园里有许多漂亮的建筑。

sentence: The teacher made an ______ about the exam.
sentence_translation: 老师发布了一则关于考试的通知。

sentence: The manager put forward a new ______ at the meeting.
sentence_translation: 经理在会议上提出了一项新提议。

sentence: The ______ of the new bridge will start next month.
sentence_translation: 新桥的建设将于下个月开始。

sentence: His ______ behavior in class made the teacher angry.
sentence_translation: 他在课堂上的扰乱性行为让老师很生气。

sentence: The training ______ will last for three hours.
sentence_translation: 这次培训时段将持续三个小时。

sentence: We apologize for any ______ caused by the delay.
sentence_translation: 我们对延误造成的任何不便表示歉意。

sentence: She ______ thanked everyone for their help.
sentence_translation: 她真诚地感谢每个人的帮助。

sentence: Is there a room ______ for the meeting tomorrow?
sentence_translation: 明天有会议室有空吗？

sentence: Can I ______ your pen for a moment?
sentence_translation: 我能借你的笔用一下吗？

sentence: This ______ on the list is very important.
sentence_translation: 清单上的这个项目非常重要。

sentence: We often go to the ______ to read books.
sentence_translation: 我们经常去图书馆看书。

sentence: The hotel ______ are very friendly and helpful.
sentence_translation: 酒店员工非常友好且乐于助人。

sentence: What's the ______ of this article?
sentence_translation: 这篇文章的标题是什么？

sentence: He graduated from a famous ______ last year.
sentence_translation: 他去年从一所著名的大学毕业。

sentence: We ______ all guests to leave before 10 p.m.
sentence_translation: 我们要求所有客人在晚上10点前离开。

sentence: The sports center has excellent ______ for swimmers.
sentence_translation: 体育中心有完善的游泳设施。

sentence: We need to ______ our English skills to communicate better.
sentence_translation: 我们需要提高英语技能以更好地交流。

sentence: The latest news is posted on the school ______ board.
sentence_translation: 最新消息发布在学校公告栏上。

sentence: She wants to ______ her thanks to you in person.
sentence_translation: 她想亲自向你表达感谢。

sentence: He ______ explained his plan to the team.
sentence_translation: 他向团队简要地解释了他的计划。

sentence: The patient's ______ is getting better day by day.
sentence_translation: 病人的状况一天天好转。

sentence: Reading is part of my ______ life.
sentence_translation: 阅读是我日常生活的一部分。

sentence: Please turn to the sports ______ of the newspaper.
sentence_translation: 请翻到报纸的体育板块。

sentence: We need ______ information for the report.
sentence_translation: 我们需要最新的信息来写这份报告。

sentence: The media ______ of the event was extensive.
sentence_translation: 媒体对这一事件的报道很广泛。

sentence: The ______ will be completed by the end of the year.
sentence_translation: 这个项目将在年底完成。

sentence: We walked along the ______ to the park.
sentence_translation: 我们沿着人行道走到公园。

sentence: Let's check the ______ to see when the train leaves.
sentence_translation: 我们查一下时刻表看看火车什么时候开。

sentence: We need to hire ______ workers for the job.
sentence_translation: 我们需要为这项工作雇佣额外的工人。

sentence: Work can put a lot of ______ on family life.
sentence_translation: 工作会给家庭生活带来很大压力。

sentence: We need to stay within the ______ for this project.
sentence_translation: 我们需要在这个项目的预算范围内。

sentence: The ______ caused many roads to be closed.
sentence_translation: 暴风雪导致许多道路封闭。

sentence: His ______ of stamps is very valuable.
sentence_translation: 他的邮票收藏品非常珍贵。

sentence: I need to talk to you about a ______ matter.
sentence_translation: 我需要和你谈谈一件特定的事情。

sentence: My father will ______ the broken bike this weekend.
sentence_translation: 我爸爸这个周末会修理那辆坏了的自行车。

sentence: The journalist will ______ the conference tomorrow.
sentence_translation: 记者明天将报道这次会议。

sentence: We put up a ______ to advertise the concert.
sentence_translation: 我们贴了一张海报来宣传音乐会。

sentence: She is ______ working on a new book.
sentence_translation: 她目前正在写一本新书。

sentence: Students have free ______ to the computer lab.
sentence_translation: 学生可以免费使用计算机实验室。

sentence: The car is parked in the ______ across the street.
sentence_translation: 车停在街对面的停车场。

sentence: This is a great ______ for a picnic.
sentence_translation: 这是野餐的好地方。

sentence: Do you know the ______ time the meeting will start?
sentence_translation: 你知道会议开始的确切时间吗？

sentence: She ______ ever goes out on weekends.
sentence_translation: 她周末几乎不出去。

sentence: Please put your ______ in the closet.
sentence_translation: 请把你的东西放进衣柜里。

sentence: The ______ problem is lack of funding.
sentence_translation: 主要问题是资金短缺。

sentence: She ______ a heart from the red paper.
sentence_translation: 她从红纸上剪出一颗心。

sentence: Using a ______ can make your writing flow better.
sentence_translation: 使用过渡性表达可以让你的写作更流畅。

sentence: He ______ the magazine while waiting.
sentence_translation: 他等待时浏览了这本杂志。

sentence: If you ______ this plan, you will succeed.
sentence_translation: 如果你坚持这个计划，你会成功的。

sentence: I finally ______ cleaning the house yesterday.
sentence_translation: 我昨天终于抽出时间打扫房子了。

sentence: She always ______ a notebook to write down ideas.
sentence_translation: 她总是随身携带一个笔记本记录想法。

sentence: ______, I want to thank everyone for coming.
sentence_translation: 首先，我想感谢大家的到来。

sentence: His illness ______ his family.
sentence_translation: 他的病给家人带来了压力和负担。

sentence: The class is ______, so we can't go in.
sentence_translation: 课正在进行中，所以我们不能进去。

sentence: There are not enough ______ in the downtown area.
sentence_translation: 市中心没有足够的停车位。

sentence: The birds ______ the tree before flying away.
sentence_translation: 鸟儿绕着树飞了几圈然后飞走了。

sentence: I need ______ days to finish the work.
sentence_translation: 我需要几天时间完成这项工作。

sentence: It's important to ______ your expenses.
sentence_translation: 跟踪你的开支很重要。

sentence: The meeting will ______ in the conference room.
sentence_translation: 会议将在会议室举行。

sentence: Children ______ watch TV for an hour a day.
sentence_translation: 孩子们被允许每天看一小时电视。

sentence: I'm ______ because it's a good idea.
sentence_translation: 我非常赞成，因为这是个好主意。
